enum.name: Boolean
enum.description: Boolean type

enum.name: AllocTransType
enum.description: Identifies allocation transaction type.

enum.name: AllocReportType
enum.description: Describes the specific type or purpose of an Allocation Report message.

enum.name: AllocType
enum.description: Describes the specific type or purpose of an Allocation message.

enum.name: AllocNoOrdersType
enum.description: Indicates how the orders being booked and allocated by an Allocation Instruction.

enum.name: AllocStatus
enum.description: Identifies status of allocation.

enum.name: QuoteStatus
enum.description: Identifies the status of the quote acknowledgement.

enum.name: PosType
enum.description: Used to identify the type of quantity.

enum.name: MassActionScope
enum.description: Specifies the scope of the action. All Day and MOC orders will be cancelled. GTC, GTD and MOA orders will not be cancelled.

enum.name: MassActionType
enum.description: Specifies the type of action requested.

enum.name: MassActionResponse
enum.description: Specifies the action taken by matching engine when it receives the Order Mass Action Request.

enum.name: MassActionRejectReason
enum.description: Reason Order Mass Action Request was rejected.

enum.name: SecurityResponseType
enum.description: Type of Security Definition message response.

enum.name: PosMaintStatus
enum.description: Status of Position Maintenance Request.

enum.name: ExecuteUnderlyingTrade
enum.description: Specifies if a simultaneous trade of the underlying is to be performed.

enum.name: PosTransType
enum.description: Identifies the type of position transaction.

enum.name: PosMaintAction
enum.description: Maintenance Action to be performed.

enum.name: SettlType
enum.description: Indicates who in the contract has control over evoking settlement.

enum.name: SelfTradePreventionInstruction
enum.description: Indicates which order should be canceled due to self-trade prevention.

enum.name: TimeUnit
enum.description: Unit of time used for measurement.

enum.name: MessageType
enum.description: Defines message type.

enum.name: FlowType
enum.description: Type of message flow from client to server or from server to client.

enum.name: NegotiationRejectCode
enum.description: Identifies the code of reject negotiation.

enum.name: EstablishRejectCode
enum.description: Identifies the code of reject establishment.

enum.name: TerminationCode
enum.description: Identifies the code of termination.

enum.name: RetransmitRejectCode
enum.description: Identifies the code of reject retransmission.

enum.name: CancelOnDisconnectType
enum.description: Criteria used to initiate cancel on disconnect mechanism by the gateway.

enum.name: Side
enum.description: Side of order.

enum.name: TimeInForce
enum.description: Specifies how long the order remains in effect.

enum.name: OrdType
enum.description: Order type.

enum.name: RoutingInstruction
enum.description: Indicates additional order instruction.

enum.name: ExecType
enum.description: Describes the action that triggered this specific Execution Report - see the OrdStatus (39) tag for the current order status (e.g, Partially Filled).

enum.name: OrdStatus
enum.description: Identifies current status of order.

enum.name: ExecRestatementReason
enum.description: Indicates reason of restatement, if available.

enum.name: MultiLegReportingType
enum.description: Used to indicate what an Execution Report represents.

enum.name: OrderCategory
enum.description: Defines the type of interest behind a trade i.e. why a trade occurred.

enum.name: AccountType
enum.description: Type of Account associated with an order.

enum.name: CxlRejResponseTo
enum.description: Identifies the type of request that this cancel reject is in response to.

type.name: AllocID
type.description: Unique identifier for this allocation instruction message.

type.name: ClOrdID
type.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

type.name: ClOrdIDOptional
type.description: Optional unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

type.name: SessionID
type.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by Exchange.

type.name: SessionVerID
type.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to exchange gateway associated with given SessionId.

type.name: SeqNum
type.description: Implicit sequence number of a given SessionID/SessionVerID.

type.name: Quantity
type.description: Quantity in order/trade.

type.name: QuantityOptional
type.description: Optional quantity in order/trade.

type.name: LocalMktDate
type.description: Local calendar date: days since Unix epoch (January 1st, 1970).

type.name: Account
type.description: Account mnemonic.

type.name: Firm
type.description: Identification of the broker firm.

type.name: FirmOptional
type.description: Optional identification of the broker firm.

type.name: Trader
type.description: Identification of the trader.

type.name: TraderOptional
type.description: Optional identification of the trader.

type.name: ExecID
type.description: Unique identifier of execution message as assigned by exchange.

type.name: ExecIDOptional
type.description: Optional unique identifier of execution message as assigned by exchange.

type.name: OrderID
type.description: Exchange-generated order identifier.

type.name: OrderIDOptional
type.description: Optional exchange-generated order identifier.

type.name: SenderLocation
type.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

type.name: InvestorID
type.description: Unique identifier of customer.

type.name: RejReason
type.description: Code to identify reason for order rejection. Please refer to the error codes document for domain information.

type.name: AllocReportID
type.description: Unique identifier for this allocation report message.

type.name: PosMaintRptID
type.description: Unique identifier for this position maintenance report message.

type.name: PosMaintRptIDOptional
type.description: Optional unique identifier for this position maintenance report message.

type.name: PosReqID
type.description: Unique identifier for the position maintenance request.

type.name: PosReqIDOptional
type.description: Optional unique identifier for the position maintenance request.

type.name: DayOffset
type.description: Day offset between 2 dates.

type.name: SecurityReqRespID
type.description: Unique ID of a Security Definition Request/Response.

type.name: SecurityStrategyType
type.description: Indicates the type of Strategy created.

type.name: BusinessRejectRefID
type.description: Value of business-level identification field on the message being referenced.

type.name: MassActionReportID
type.description: Unique ID of Order Mass Action Report as assigned by the matching engine.

type.name: OrdTagID
type.description: Identifies the order tag identification.

type.name: MarketSegmentID
type.description: Identifies the market segment. Required for all tradable instruments. Not present in equity indexes, ETF indexes, BTB and Option Exercise.

type.name: SecurityID
type.description: Security identification as defined by exchange. For the SecurityID list, see the Security List/Definition message in Market Data feed.

type.name: SecurityIDOptional
type.description: Optional security identification as defined by exchange. For the SecurityID list, see the Security List/Definition message in Market Data feed.

type.name: SecurityIDSource
type.description: Identifies class or source of the SecurityID(48) value.

type.name: SecurityExchange
type.description: Market Identifier Code: 4-character used to identify stock markets and other trading exchanges.

type.name: Symbol
type.description: B3 requires that this field is properly set. It contains the human readable form of the SecurityID tag ans is also available in the Security List message in Market Data feed.

type.name: SecurityGroup
type.description: Indicates the group this instrument belongs to.

type.name: CrossID
type.description: Identifier for a cross order. Must be unique during a given trading day.

type.name: TradeID
type.description: The unique identification assigned to the trade entity once it is received or matched by the exchange or central counterparty.

type.name: QuoteID
type.description: Unique identifier for quote.

type.name: QuoteIDOptional
type.description: Optional unique identifier for quote.

type.name: QuoteReqID
type.description: Unique identifier for quote request.

type.name: QuoteReqIDOptional
type.description: Optional unique identifier for quote request.

type.name: TotNoRelatedSym
type.description: Number of leg fill notice messages sent with spread summary.

type.name: MessageCounter
type.description: Counter of related messages.

composite.name: messageHeader
composite.description: Message identifiers and length of message root.

type.name: blockLength
type.description: Length of the root of the FIX message contained before repeating groups or variable/conditions fields.

type.name: templateId
type.description: Template ID used to encode the message.

type.name: schemaId
type.description: ID of the system publishing the message.

type.name: version
type.description: Schema version.

type.name: blockLength
type.description: Root block length.

type.name: numInGroup
type.description: Counter representing the number of entries in a repeating group.

composite.name: FramingHeader
composite.description: Compact Simple Open Framing Header: length in uint16 instead of uint32.

type.name: messageLength
type.description: Message length (including Framing and SBE headers).

type.name: encodingType
type.description: Encoding type of payload.

type.name: mantissa
type.description: Mantissa (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: exponent
type.description: Exponent (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: mantissa
type.description: Mantissa (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: exponent
type.description: Exponent (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

composite.name: PriceOffsetOptional
composite.description: Price Offset (4 decimal places). Usually 3 places are enough, but FX requires 4.

type.name: mantissa
type.description: Mantissa (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: exponent
type.description: Exponent (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: mantissa
type.description: Mantissa (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: exponent
type.description: Exponent (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

composite.name: RatioQty
composite.description: Ratio of quantity relative to the whole thing.

type.name: mantissa
type.description: Mantissa (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: exponent
type.description: Exponent (for fixed-point decimal numbers).

type.name: time
type.description: UTC timestamp with nanosecond precision (Unix Epoch).

type.name: unit
type.description: time unit (nanoseconds).

type.name: time
type.description: Interval time expressed in milliseconds.

type.name: unit
type.description: time unit (milliseconds).

type.name: time
type.description: Interval time expressed in nanoseconds.

type.name: unit
type.description: time unit (nanoseconds).

composite.name: CredentialsEncoding
composite.description: Credentials to identify/authenticate the client in UTF-8 format.

type.name: length
type.description: Length of credentials data.

type.name: varData
type.description: Credentials data in UTF-8.

composite.name: MemoEncoding
composite.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

type.name: length
type.description: Length of free format text field defined by client.

type.name: varData
type.description: Free UTF-8 format text field defined by client.

type.name: length
type.description: Length of free format text string generated by exchange.

type.name: varData
type.description: Free ASCII format text string generated by exchange.

composite.name: DeskIDEncoding
composite.description: Identify the client associated with the given account number. This information may be used to correlate the order entry messages with the messages at the back-office and clearing systems.

type.name: length
type.description: Length of trading desk identification.

type.name: varData
type.description: Trading desk identification in ASCII format.

composite.name: ClientAppEncoding
composite.description: Identifies the IP address, name and version declared for audit.

type.name: length
type.description: Length of client system information.

type.name: varData
type.description: Client system information.

composite.name: CustodianInfo
composite.description: Custodian information is required for going private offer.

type.name: custodian
type.description: Identifies the custodian.

type.name: custodyAccount
type.description: Identifies the custody account.

type.name: custodyAllocationType
type.description: Custody allocation type.

sbe:message.name: Negotiate
sbe:message.description: The client sends the Negotiate message to B3 to initiate a connection. Negotiate is the first message that the client must sent to start the communication between client and gateway through a TCP socket connection.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = Negotiate.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: timestamp
field.description: Time of request. Sent in number of nanoseconds since Unix epoch.

field.name: clientFlow
field.description: Type of flow from client to server. It is a constant value = idempotent.

field.name: enteringFirm
field.description: Identifies the broker firm that will enter orders.

field.name: onbehalfFirm
field.description: Identifies the broker firm who executes their orders on behalf.

data.name: clientAppName
data.description: Application name as informed during certification process.

data.name: clientAppVersion
data.description: Application version as informed during certification process.

sbe:message.name: NegotiateResponse
sbe:message.description: The NegotiationResponse message is sent when a Negotiate message from the client is accepted by B3.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = NegotiateResponse.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: requestTimestamp
field.description: Matches Negotiate timestamp.

field.name: serverFlow
field.description: Type of flow from client to server. It is a constant value = recoverable.

field.name: clientFlow
field.description: Type of flow from client to server. It is a constant value = idempotent.

field.name: enteringFirm
field.description: Identifies the broker firm that will enter orders.

sbe:message.name: NegotiateReject
sbe:message.description: NegotiateReject message is sent when B3 rejects a Negotiate message sent by the client.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = NegotiateReject.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: requestTimestamp
field.description: Matches Negotiate timestamp.

field.name: clientFlow
field.description: Type of flow from client to server. It is a constant value = idempotent.

field.name: enteringFirm
field.description: Identifies the broker firm that will enter orders.

field.name: negotiationRejectCode
field.description: Identifies the code of reject negotiation.

sbe:message.name: Establish
sbe:message.description: After negotiation level is complete, the client must send an Establish message to start assigning sequence numbers and also to keep the connection active. Once the connection is established, client can submit orders and quotes.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = Establish.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: timestamp
field.description: Time of request. Sent in number of nanoseconds since Unix epoch.

field.name: keepAliveInterval
field.description: Longest time in milliseconds the initiator should remain silent before sending Sequence message.

field.name: nextSeqNo
field.description: The next application sequence number to be produced by the client.

field.name: cancelOnDisconnectType
field.description: Criteria used to initiate cancel on disconnect mechanism by the gateway.

field.name: codTimeoutWindow
field.description: Gateway will not trigger CoD if the customer reconnects within the timeout window (milliseconds) which starts when the triggering event is detected. Value = 0 then CoD will not be enabled.

sbe:message.name: EstablishAck
sbe:message.description: The EstablishmentAck message is sent when an Establish message is accepted by B3. EstablishmentAck message contains next sequence number. At the start of a session, default value is 1 (one).

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = EstablishAck.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: requestTimestamp
field.description: Matches Negotiate timestamp.

field.name: keepAliveInterval
field.description: Longest time in milliseconds the initiator should remain silent before sending Sequence message.

field.name: nextSeqNo
field.description: The next application sequence number to be produced by the gateway.

field.name: lastIncomingSeqNo
field.description: Indicates the application sequence number of the last application message received by the server from the client. At the start of a session, default value is 0 (zero).

sbe:message.name: EstablishReject
sbe:message.description: EstablishmentReject message is sent when an Establish message is rejected by B3 informing the reason of rejection.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = EstablishReject.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: requestTimestamp
field.description: Matches Negotiate timestamp.

field.name: establishmentRejectCode
field.description: Identifies the code of reject establishment.

sbe:message.name: Terminate
sbe:message.description: Terminate message is sent to indicate that the sender is going to disconnect the TCP socket connection.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = Terminate.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: terminationCode
field.description: Identifies the code of termination.

sbe:message.name: NotApplied
sbe:message.description: NotApplied message is sent when B3 detects messages that already been sent (concept of idempotence) or an invalid message format from the client.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = NotApplied.

field.name: fromSeqNo
field.description: The first applied sequence number.

field.name: count
field.description: How many messages haven´t been applied?

sbe:message.name: Sequence
sbe:message.description: Sequence message is used for both: Recoverable (B3 to client) and Idempotent (client to B3) flows.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = Sequence.

field.name: nextSeqNo
field.description: The next application sequence number to be produced by the client.

sbe:message.name: FinishedSending
sbe:message.description: FinishedSending message must be sent to finish a logical session when the last application message in a flow has been sent.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = FinishedSending.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

field.name: lastSeqNo
field.description: Indicates the application sequence number of the last application message published from the client to the server. Must be populated for an idempotent or recoverable flow.

sbe:message.name: FinishedReceiving
sbe:message.description: When all application messages have been processed, a FinishedReceiving message is sent B3, consequently the transport is terminated.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = FinishedReceiving.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: sessionVerID
field.description: Session version identification: unique identification of a sequence of messages to be transmitted to/from B3´s gateways associated with given SessionId. Need to be incremented each time Negotiate message is sent to gateway.

sbe:message.name: RetransmitRequest
sbe:message.description: RetransmitRequest message is used for client to recover missed messages.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = RetransmitRequest.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: timestamp
field.description: Time of request. Sent in number of nanoseconds since Unix epoch.

field.name: fromSeqNo
field.description: The first applied sequence number.

field.name: count
field.description: Maximum number of messages to be retransmitted.

sbe:message.name: Retransmission
sbe:message.description: Retransmission message is sent when a RetransmitRequest message from the client is accepted by B3.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = Retransmission.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: requestTimestamp
field.description: Matches Negotiate timestamp.

field.name: nextSeqNo
field.description: The next application sequence number to be produced by the client.

field.name: count
field.description: Number of messages to be retransmitted.

sbe:message.name: RetransmitReject
sbe:message.description: RetransmitReject message is sent when a RetransmitRequest message is rejected by B3. More details are described in the Message Specification Guidelines document.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = RetransmitReject.

field.name: sessionID
field.description: Counterparty identification of gateway in the connection assigned by B3.

field.name: requestTimestamp
field.description: Matches Negotiate timestamp.

field.name: retransmitRejectCode
field.description: Identifies the code of reject retransmission.

sbe:message.name: SimpleNewOrder
sbe:message.description: SimpleNewOrder message submits a simple new order focused on sent only main parameters with low complexity. Used by client to enter a simple order in the system.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = SimpleNewOrder.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: price
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP).

field.name: orderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: ordType
field.description: Order type.

field.name: timeInForce
field.description: Specifies how long the order remains in effect.

field.name: ordTagID
field.description: Identifies the order tag identification.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: investorID
field.description: Unique identifier of customer.

sbe:message.name: SimpleModifyOrder
sbe:message.description: The SimpleModifyOrder submits a simple modify request for basic parameters like price and quantity. The client sends the SimpleModifyOrder message to B3 to modify some order values only.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = SimpleModifyOrder.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: price
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP).

field.name: orderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered.

field.name: origClOrdID
field.description: ClOrdID which should be replaced.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: ordType
field.description: Order type.

field.name: ordTagID
field.description: Identifies the order tag identification.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

sbe:message.name: NewOrderSingle
sbe:message.description: NewOrderSingle message is used to enter an order in the system; the behavior of an order can be affected by many parameters such as order type and order type qualifier.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = NewOrderSingle.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: price
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP).

field.name: orderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: ordType
field.description: Order type.

field.name: timeInForce
field.description: Specifies how long the order remains in effect.

field.name: ordTagID
field.description: Identifies the order tag identification.

field.name: mmProtectionReset
field.description: Resets Market Protections. When Market Protections are triggered, the Exchange will not accept new orders for that product group without tag MMProtectionReset: True = Reset Market Maker Protection; False = Do nothing related to Market Maker Protection.

field.name: routingInstruction
field.description: Indicates additional order instruction.

field.name: selfTradePreventionInstruction
field.description: Indicates which order should be canceled due to Self-Trade Prevention.

field.name: stopPx
field.description: The stop price of a stop limit order (Conditionally required if OrdType = 4).

field.name: minQty
field.description: Minimum quantity of an order to be executed.

field.name: maxFloor
field.description: Maximum number of shares or contracts within an order to be shown on the match engine at any given time.

field.name: investorID
field.description: Unique identifier of customer.

field.name: custodianInfo
field.description: Identifies the custodian.

field.name: expireDate
field.description: Date of order expiration (last day the order can trade), always expressed in terms of the local market date.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

sbe:message.name: OrderCancelReplaceRequest
sbe:message.description: Sent by client system to replace an existing order.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = OrderCancelReplaceRequest.

field.name: origClOrdID
field.description: ClOrdID which should be replaced.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: price
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP).

field.name: orderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: accountType
field.description: Type of account associated with an order.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: ordType
field.description: Order type.

field.name: ordTagID
field.description: Identifies the order tag identification.

field.name: mmProtectionReset
field.description: Resets Market Protections. When Market Protections are triggered, the Exchange will not accept new orders for that product group without tag MMProtectionReset: True = Reset Market Maker Protection; False = Do nothing related to Market Maker Protection.

field.name: routingInstruction
field.description: Indicates additional order instruction.

field.name: timeInForce
field.description: Specifies how long the order remains in effect.

field.name: minQty
field.description: Minimum quantity of an order to be executed.

field.name: maxFloor
field.description: Maximum number of shares or contracts within an order to be shown on the match engine at any given time.

field.name: investorID
field.description: Unique identifier of customer.

field.name: custodianInfo
field.description: Identifies the custodian.

field.name: expireDate
field.description: Date of order expiration (last day the order can trade), always expressed in terms of the local market date.

field.name: stopPx
field.description: The stop price of a stop limit order (Conditionally required if OrdType = 4).

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: executingTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is executing an order.

field.name: selfTradePreventionInstruction
field.description: Indicates which order should be canceled due to Self-Trade Prevention.

sbe:message.name: OrderCancelRequest
sbe:message.description: OrderCancelRequest message submits a deletion of an existing order by referencing the original client order id.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = OrderCancelRequest.

field.name: origClOrdID
field.description: ClOrdID which should be replaced.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: executingTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is executing an order.

sbe:message.name: NewOrderCross
sbe:message.description: The NewOrderCross message submits a Cross on Order Entry gateway, a two-sided order submitted by a single party/broker at the same price and quantity.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = NewOrderCross.

field.name: crossID
field.description: ID of electronically submitted cross order by the institution (if in response to a cross order).

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: price
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP).

field.name: orderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: externalRFQIndicator
field.description: Identifies if the cross is originated from RFQ System.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: enteringFirm
field.description: Identifies the broker firm that will enter orders.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

sbe:message.name: ExecutionReport_New
sbe:message.description: Execution Report - New message is sent in response to a NewOrderSingle or SimpleNewOrder messages, or also from a restated iceberg order.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for order as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: secondaryOrderID
field.description: Exchange-generated order identifier that changes for each order modification event, or quantity replenishment in disclosed orders.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Indicates date of trading day (expressed in local time at place of trade). Sent in number of days since Unix epoch.

field.name: protectionPrice
field.description: Conditionally returned on execution reports for Market and Stop Protect orders. This contains the final protection price limit at which any unmatched quantity will rest on the book.

field.name: ordStatus
field.description: Identifies current status of order.

field.name: execRestatementReason
field.description: Used to communicate event type which triggers the Order Mass Action Request.

field.name: multiLegReportingType
field.description: Used to indicate what an Execution Report represents. Default value is 1 (Single Security).

field.name: workingIndicator
field.description: Indicates if an order has been triggered and is available for trading. Used with Stop (Limit, with protection) orders and the At the Close validity.

field.name: selfTradePreventionInstruction
field.description: Indicates which order should be canceled due to Self-Trade Prevention.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

field.name: marketSegmentReceivedTime
field.description: Time of receipt of related inbound message in the market segment path.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: ExecutionReport_Modify
sbe:message.description: Execution Report - Modify message is sent in response to OrderCancelReplaceRequest or SimpleModifyOrder messages.

field.name: execID
field.description: Unique identifier of execution message as assigned by the exchange – unique per instrument.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for order as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: secondaryOrderID
field.description: Exchange-generated order identifier that changes for each order modification event, or quantity replenishment in disclosed orders.

field.name: ordStatus
field.description: Identifies current status of order.

field.name: multiLegReportingType
field.description: Used to indicate what an Execution Report represents. Default value is 1 (Single Security).

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Indicates date of trading day (expressed in local time at place of trade). Sent in number of days since Unix epoch.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

field.name: protectionPrice
field.description: Conditionally returned on execution reports for Market and Stop Protect orders. This contains the final protection price limit at which any unmatched quantity will rest on the book.

field.name: marketSegmentReceivedTime
field.description: Time of receipt of related inbound message in the market segment path.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: ExecutionReport_Cancel
sbe:message.description: ExecutionReport - Cancel message is sent in response to Order Cancel Request as well as to report unsolicited cancellation of orders due to: Market Operations or Cancel On Disconnect mechanism.

field.name: execID
field.description: Unique identifier of execution message as assigned by the exchange – unique per instrument.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for order as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: secondaryOrderID
field.description: Exchange-generated order identifier that changes for each order modification event, or quantity replenishment in disclosed orders.

field.name: ordStatus
field.description: Identifies current status of order.

field.name: execRestatementReason
field.description: Used to communicate event type which triggers the Order Mass Action Request.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

field.name: marketSegmentReceivedTime
field.description: Time of receipt of related inbound message in the market segment path.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: ExecutionReport_Trade
sbe:message.description: Execution Report – Trade/Trade Bust message is sent with order fills that were traded and processed on Matching Engine. Also, trade bust included on behalf of B3’s desk.

field.name: execID
field.description: Unique identifier of execution message as assigned by the exchange – unique per instrument.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for order as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: secondaryOrderID
field.description: Exchange-generated order identifier that changes for each order modification event, or quantity replenishment in disclosed orders.

field.name: lastPx
field.description: Price of last fill.

field.name: lastQty
field.description: Quantity of shares bought/sold on the last fill.

field.name: aggressorIndicator
field.description: Identify whether the order initiator is an aggressor or not in the trade.

field.name: ordStatus
field.description: Identifies current status of order.

field.name: execType
field.description: Describes the action that triggered this specific Execution Report - see the OrdStatus (39) tag for the current order status (e.g, Partially Filled).

field.name: multiLegReportingType
field.description: Used to indicate what an Execution Report represents. Default value is 1 (Single Security).

field.name: leavesQty
field.description: Amount of shares open for further execution, or unexecuted. .

field.name: cumQty
field.description: Total number of shares or contracts filled.

field.name: uniqueTradeID
field.description: Contains the unique identifier for this trade, per instrument + trading date, as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: contraBroker
field.description: Identifies the contra broker firm.

field.name: execRefID
field.description: Optionally sent when reporting a trade bust. Contains the identifier of the busted trade.

field.name: secondaryExecID
field.description: Unique identifier present in all messages associated with a spread transaction. This value allows linking spread summary fill notice, leg fill notices, and leg trade cancellation execution report messages generated from a spread transaction.

field.name: crossID
field.description: ID of electronically submitted cross order by the institution (if in response to a cross order).

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Indicates date of trading day (expressed in local time at place of trade). Sent in number of days since Unix epoch.

field.name: totNoRelatedSym
field.description: Number of leg fill notice messages sent with spread summary.

field.name: orderCategory
field.description: Reason why a trade occurred.

field.name: externalRFQIndicator
field.description: Identifies if the trade is originated from RFQ System.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: ExecutionReport_Reject
sbe:message.description: Execution Report - Reject message notifies the reason a client request was not accepted by Matching Engine.

field.name: execID
field.description: Unique identifier of execution message as assigned by the exchange – unique per instrument.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for order as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: ordStatus
field.description: Identifies current status of order.

field.name: cxlRejResponseTo
field.description: Identifies the type of request that this Cancel Reject is in response to.

field.name: ordRejReason
field.description: Code to identify reason for order rejection. Please refer to the error codes document for domain information.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: marketSegmentReceivedTime
field.description: Time of receipt of related inbound message in the market segment path.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: ExecutionReport_Forward
sbe:message.description: Execution Report – Forward message is sent with order fills were traded and processed on Matching Engine for Forward exclusively (Termo).

field.name: execID
field.description: Unique identifier of execution message as assigned by the exchange – unique per instrument.

field.name: orderID
field.description: Unique identifier for order as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: secondaryOrderID
field.description: Exchange-generated order identifier that changes for each order modification event, or quantity replenishment in disclosed orders.

field.name: lastQty
field.description: Quantity of shares bought/sold on the last fill.

field.name: lastPx
field.description: Price of last fill.

field.name: leavesQty
field.description: Amount of shares open for further execution, or unexecuted. .

field.name: cumQty
field.description: Total number of shares or contracts filled.

field.name: uniqueTradeID
field.description: Contains the unique identifier for this trade, per instrument + trading date, as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: contraBroker
field.description: Identifies the contra broker firm.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Indicates date of trading day (expressed in local time at place of trade). Sent in number of days since Unix epoch.

field.name: execRefID
field.description: Optionally sent when reporting a trade bust. Contains the identifier of the busted trade.

field.name: secondaryExecID
field.description: Unique identifier present in all messages associated with a spread transaction. This value allows linking spread summary fill notice, leg fill notices, and leg trade cancellation execution report messages generated from a spread transaction.

field.name: crossID
field.description: ID of electronically submitted cross order by the institution (if in response to a cross order).

field.name: aggressorIndicator
field.description: Identify whether the order initiator is an aggressor or not in the trade.

field.name: ordStatus
field.description: Identifies current status of order.

field.name: settlType
field.description: Indicates who in the contract has control over evoking settlement.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

field.name: daysToSettlement
field.description: Deadline for completing the forward deal. For Common, Dollar and Index contracts must be between 16 and 999. And maximum of 90 days for Flexible.

field.name: fixedRate
field.description: Describes the interest to be paid by the forward buyer and received by the forward seller, in proportion to the agreed days to settlement. Expressed in decimal form. For example, 1% is expressed and sent as 0.01. One basis point is represented as 0.0001.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: BusinessMessageReject
sbe:message.description: BusinessMessageReject message can reject an application-level message which fulfills session level rules but fails the business rules.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = BusinessMessageReject.

field.name: refSeqNum
field.description: Message sequence number of rejected message.

field.name: refMsgType
field.description: MsgType of the FIX message being referenced.

field.name: businessRejectRefID
field.description: The value of the business-level “ID” field on the message being referenced. Required unless the corresponding ID field was not specified.

field.name: businessRejectReason
field.description: Code to identify the reason of the rejection.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: SecurityDefinitionRequest
sbe:message.description: The SecurityDefinitionRequest message creates a User Defined Spread (UDS) instrument. User-Defined Spreads provide users of the electronic trading platform the ability to create strategies composed by their choice of leg instruments, leg ratio and leg side.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = SecurityDefinitionRequest.

field.name: securityReqID
field.description: Unique ID of a Security Definition Request.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: legSecurityID
field.description: Multileg instrument's individual security’s SecurityID. See SecurityID (48) field for description.

field.name: legSecurityIDSource
field.description: Multileg instrument's individual security’s SecurityIDSource. See SecurityIDSource (22) field for description. Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: legSecurityExchange
field.description: Exchange code the leg security belongs to.

field.name: legRatioQty
field.description: The ratio of quantity for this individual leg relative to the entire multileg security.

field.name: legSide
field.description: The side of this individual leg (multileg security). See Side (54) field for description and values.

sbe:message.name: SecurityDefinitionResponse
sbe:message.description: The SecurityDefinitioresponse message is sent in response to an attempt to create a new security definition.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = SecurityDefinitionResponse.

field.name: securityReqID
field.description: Unique ID of a Security Definition Request.

field.name: securityResponseID
field.description: Unique ID of a Security Definition message.

field.name: securityResponseType
field.description: Type of Security Definition message response.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: symbol
field.description: B3 requires that this field is properly set. It contains the human readable form of the SecurityID tag, available in the Security List message in Market Data feed.

field.name: securityStrategyType
field.description: Indicates the type of Strategy created. This field is not sent on rejects.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

sbe:message.name: QuoteRequest
sbe:message.description: The Quote Request message is used within the context of this Forward transaction in which two parties have completed a deal outside the Exchange and are initiating the negotiation process to formalize and execute this operation on the Exchange.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = QuoteRequest.

field.name: quoteReqID
field.description: Unique identifier for quote request.

field.name: quoteID
field.description: Unique identifier for quote.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: orderQty
field.description: Quantity ordered.

field.name: uniqueTradeID
field.description: Contains the unique identifier for this trade, per instrument + trading date, as assigned by the exchange.

field.name: fixedRate
field.description: Describes the interest to be paid by the forward buyer and received by the forward seller, in proportion to the agreed days to settlement. Expressed in decimal form. For example, 1% is expressed and sent as 0.01. One basis point is represented as 0.0001.

field.name: price
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP).

field.name: daysToSettlement
field.description: Deadline for completing the forward deal. For Common, Dollar and Index contracts must be between 16 and 999. And maximum of 90 days for Flexible.

field.name: privateQuote
field.description: Specifies whether a quote is public, i.e. available to the market, or private, i.e. available to a specified counterparty only. .

field.name: settlType
field.description: Indicates who in the contract has control over evoking settlement.

field.name: executeUnderlyingTrade
field.description: Specifies if a simultaneous trade of the underlying is to be performed.Required to indicate Termo Vista and Termo Vista Registered.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

field.name: contraBroker
field.description: Broker identifier as assigned by B3 used to indicate the counterparty brokerage firm in a Forward deal.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: QuoteStatusReport
sbe:message.description: The QuoteStatusReport message is to inform the current status of forward acceptance.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = QuoteStatusReport.

field.name: quoteReqID
field.description: Unique identifier for quote request.

field.name: quoteID
field.description: Unique identifier for quote.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: price
field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders and RLP).

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: quoteRejectReason
field.description: Reason Quote was rejected.

field.name: quoteStatus
field.description: Identifies the status of the quote acknowledgement.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

sbe:message.name: Quote
sbe:message.description: Quote message is used as the response to a QuoteRequest message, tradeable, and restricted tradeable quoting markets.

field.name: quoteReqID

field.description: Unique identifier for quote.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: privateQuote
field.description: Specifies whether a quote is public, i.e. available to the market, or private, i.e. available to a specified counterparty only. .

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

sbe:message.description: The QuoteCancel message is used to cancel a previous QuoteRequest message.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader

field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

sbe:message.name: QuoteRequestReject
sbe:message.description: The QuoteRequestReject message is used when a QuoteRequest is not accept by B3 due to missing or incorrect details to reject QuoteRequest messages for all quoting models.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = QuoteRequestReject.

field.name: quoteReqID
field.description: Unique identifier for quote request.

field.name: quoteID
field.description: Unique identifier for quote.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: quoteRequestRejectReason
field.description: Reason Quote was rejected.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: privateQuote
field.description: Specifies whether a quote is public, i.e. available to the market, or private, i.e. available to a specified counterparty only. .

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

sbe:message.name: PositionMaintenanceCancelRequest
sbe:message.description: PositionMaintenanceCancelRequest is a solicited cancel of PositionMaintenance message sent by client.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = PositionMaintenanceCancelRequest.

field.name: posReqID
field.description: Unique identifier for the position maintenance request.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: origPosReqRefID
field.description: Reference to the PosReqID (710) of a previous maintenance request that is being canceled.

field.name: posMaintRptRefID
field.description: Reference to a PosMaintRptID (721) from a previous Position Maintenance Report that is being canceled.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

sbe:message.name: PositionMaintenanceRequest
sbe:message.description: PositionMaintenanceRequest message allows the position owner to submit requests to the holder of a position which will result in a specific action being taken which will affect the position. Generally, the holder of the position is a central counter party or clearing organization but can also be a party providing investment services.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = PositionMaintenanceRequest.

field.name: posReqID
field.description: Unique identifier for the position maintenance request.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: clearingBusinessDate
field.description: The 'Clearing Business Date' referred to by this request. It must be set with the current date.

field.name: posTransType
field.description: Identifies the type of position transaction.

field.name: contraryInstructionIndicator
field.description: Used to indicate when a contrary instruction for exercise or abandonment is being submitted: The exercise should not happen to an ITM position or it should happen to an ATM or OTM position, always using the values of tags 709-PosTransType and 712-PosMaintAction to determine which operation will take place. Should not be submitted when false.

field.name: thresholdAmount
field.description: Used to indicate the minimum acceptable offset between the Strike Price and the Market Price.

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: posType
field.description: Used to identify the type of quantity.

field.name: longQty
field.description: Long Quantity.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: PositionMaintenanceReport
sbe:message.description: PositionMaintenanceReport message is sent by the holder of a position in response to a PositionMaintenanceRequest message and is used to confirm that a request has been successfully processed or rejected.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = PositionMaintenanceReport.

field.name: posMaintRptID
field.description: Unique identifier for this position report.

field.name: posReqID
field.description: Unique identifier for the position maintenance request.

field.name: origPosReqRefID
field.description: Reference to the PosReqID (710) of a previous maintenance request that is being canceled.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: posMaintResult
field.description: Identifies reason for rejection. Required when PosMaintStatus = 2.

field.name: tradeID
field.description: The unique ID assigned to the trade entity once it is received or matched by the exchange or central counterparty.

field.name: account
field.description: Account mnemonic of the order.

field.name: clearingBusinessDate
field.description: The 'Clearing Business Date' referred to by this request. It must be set with the current date.

field.name: posTransType
field.description: Identifies the type of position transaction.

field.name: posMaintAction
field.description: Maintenance Action to be performed.

field.name: posMaintStatus
field.description: Status of Position Maintenance Request.

field.name: accountType
field.description: Type of account associated with an order.

field.name: contraryInstructionIndicator
field.description: Used to indicate when a contrary instruction for exercise or abandonment is being submitted :The exercise should not happen to an ITM position or it should happen to an ATM or OTM position, always using the values of tags 709-PosTransType and 712-PosMaintAction to determine which operation will take place. Should not be submitted when false.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

field.name: thresholdAmount
field.description: Used to indicate the minimum acceptable offset between the Strike Price and the Market Price.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: posType
field.description: Used to identify the type of quantity.

field.name: longQty
field.description: Long Quantity.

field.name: shortQty
field.description: Short Quantity.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: AllocationInstruction
sbe:message.description: AllocationInstruction message submits a blocking position mechanism. The blocking specification functionality has been developed to provide the ability to the system, whenever necessary, to prevent the assignment of an options contract position.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = AllocationInstruction.

field.name: allocID
field.description: Unique identifier for this allocation instruction message.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: quantity
field.description: Overall/total quantity (e.g. number of shares).

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Identifies the original location for routing orders.

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Identifies the trader who is inserting an order.

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Indicates date of trading day (expressed in local time at place of trade). Sent in number of days since Unix epoch.

field.name: allocTransType
field.description: Identifies allocation transaction type.

field.name: allocType
field.description: Describes the specific type or purpose of an Allocation message.

field.name: allocNoOrdersType
field.description: Indicates how the orders being booked and allocated by an Allocation Instruction.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: tradeID
field.description: The unique ID assigned to the trade entity once it is received or matched by the exchange or central counterparty.

field.name: individualAllocID
field.description: Unique identifier for a specific NoAllocs (78) repeating group instance (e.g. for an AllocAccount).

field.name: allocAccount
field.description: Sub-account mnemonic. Required if NoAllocs > 0.

field.name: allocQty
field.description: Quantity allocated to specific sub-account.

data.name: memo
data.description: Free UTF-8 format text field. This field may be used to convey client's relevant info. It's always echoed in the reports.

sbe:message.name: AllocationReport
sbe:message.description: AllocationReport message is as response of AllocationInstruction message.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = AllocationReport.

field.name: allocReportID
field.description: Unique identifier for this message.

field.name: allocID
field.description: Unique identifier for this allocation instruction message.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: quantity
field.description: Overall/total quantity (e.g. number of shares).

field.name: tradeDate
field.description: Indicates date of trading day (expressed in local time at place of trade). Sent in number of days since Unix epoch.

field.name: allocTransType
field.description: Identifies allocation transaction type.

field.name: allocReportType
field.description: Describes the specific type or purpose of an Allocation Report message.

field.name: allocStatus
field.description: Identifies status of allocation.

field.name: allocNoOrdersType
field.description: Indicates how the orders being booked and allocated by an Allocation Instruction.

field.name: allocRejCode
field.description: Identifies reason for rejection.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

sbe:message.name: OrderMassActionRequest
sbe:message.description: OrderMassActionRequest is sent by the client system to cancel working orders that belongs to a defined criteria as per client definition.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = OrderMassActionRequest.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: marketSegmentID
field.description: Identifies the market segment.

field.name: massActionScope
field.description: Specifies the scope of the action.

field.name: massActionType
field.description: Specifies the type of action requested.

field.name: execRestatementReason
field.description: Used to communicate event type which triggers the Order Mass Action Request.

field.name: ordTagID
field.description: Identifies the order tag identification.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: securityGroup
field.description: Security group as defined by B3.

sbe:message.name: OrderMassActionReport
sbe:message.description: OrderMassActionReport message is used to acknowledge an OrderMassActionRequest message.

field.name: messageType
field.description: Message type = OrderMassActionReport.

field.name: massActionReportID
field.description: Unique ID of Order Mass Action Report as assigned by the matching engine.

field.name: clOrdID
field.description: Unique identifier of the order as assigned by the market participant.

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time of execution/order creation; expressed in UTC.

field.name: massActionResponse
field.description: Specifies the action taken by matching engine when it receives the Order Mass Action Request.

field.name: massActionScope
field.description: Specifies the scope of the action.

field.name: massActionType
field.description: Specifies the type of action requested.

field.name: execRestatementReason
field.description: Used to communicate event type which triggers the Order Mass Action Request.

field.name: massActionRejectReason
field.description: Reason Order Mass Action Request was rejected.

field.name: ordTagID
field.description: Identifies the order tag identification.

field.name: side
field.description: Side of order.

field.name: securityID
field.description: Security identification as defined by exchange.

field.name: securityIDSource
field.description: Identifies the class of the SecurityID (Exchange Symbol).

field.name: securityExchange
field.description: Market to which the symbol belongs.

field.name: securityGroup
field.description: Security group as defined by B3.

field.name: possResend
field.description: Indicates that message may contain information that has been sent under another sequence number.

sbe:message.name: SimpleOpenFramingHeaderMessage
sbe:message.description: Generate code for FramingHeader for internal/testing purposes.
